sections.heading: and flagstaffs; provide; payment
sections.text: The governing body of each school shall provide suitable flags and flagstaffs to carry out the provisions of this section and section 79-707, and the cost of such flags and flagstaffs shall be paid from the general operating funds of each school.SourceLaws 1971, LB 2

79-708.Flags and flagstaffs; provide; payment.

The governing body of each school shall provide suitable flags and flagstaffs to carry out the provisions of this section and section 79-707, and the cost of such flags and flagstaffs shall be paid from the general operating funds of each school.

SourceLaws 1971, LB 218, ยง 2;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-4,128.02;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 382.
